statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data;
SELECT project_name, compliance_status FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data WHERE regulatory_agency = 'EPA';
SELECT project_location, compliance_status FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data WHERE date_last_checked < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data ORDER BY date_last_checked DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY project_name DESC
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data WHERE regulatory_agency = 'EPA' AND compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY project_location ASC
SELECT project_name, compliance_status, date_last_checked FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data WHERE date_last_checked > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_last_checked DESC, compliance_status ASC
SELECT project_name, regulatory_agency FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data WHERE project_location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY regulatory_agency ASC
SELECT project_name, project_location, compliance_status FROM renewable_energy_compliance_data WHERE regulatory_agency IN ('EPA', 'DOE') ORDER BY compliance_status ASC, project_name DESC
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT id, project_name, compliance_status, location FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT * FROM environmental_policies WHERE compliance_level='High';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM environmental_policies;
SELECT id, project_name, location, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE location='New York';
SELECT id, project_name, location, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT project_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY compliance_status DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT id, project_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status IN ('Approved', 'Pending') ORDER BY compliance_status;
SELECT pc.id, pc.project_name, ep.policy_name FROM regulatory_compliance_data pc INNER JOIN environmental_policies ep ON pc.id = ep.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM projects WHERE compliance_level = 'Medium' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE enforcement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT violation_description, violation_date FROM violations WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT regulation_name, requirement FROM regulations WHERE enforcement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data
SELECT project_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_data
SELECT project_name, regulatory_body FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT project_name, action_taken FROM compliance_logs
SELECT project_id, project_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_data
SELECT policy_name, policy_description, policy_status FROM environmental_policies
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location FROM energy_projects
SELECT log_id, project_id, timestamp, action_taken FROM compliance_logs
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM energy_projects
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT project_id, project_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-compliant';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-compliant';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents WHERE is_approved = TRUE;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, total_cost FROM projects WHERE total_cost > 5000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
